content.detailedDescription: I was driving down the road, and decided to take a photo of a pretty sunset shining through the clouds before a thunderstorm. i spotted a dot on the photo and thought it was a refraction of light on my lens, till i zoomed in and saw it looked like a sphere with yellow dots on it. from what i can tell it was very high up.I took 3 photos and it only showed up in one of them. i did not see it until after i took the photo. i could be wrong but it looked a little different than just a lens refraction.This photo was also taken within just a few blocks away from an airport.
content.summary: Thought the orb was a refraction on my lens till i zoomed in closer. i accidentally spotted in photo of cloud.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and 4 year old daughter drew my attention to some funny red lights they were seeing in the skies. i saw 4 ufos at 9pm over the palm river estates area in north naples. through my binoculars i saw the objects close up. i saw a ring of spinning red dots forming each object. by he time my digital camera cued up the last object was going south rapidly along the naples coast. my name is tony moreno.
content.summary: I saw 4 ufos at 9pm over the palm river estates area in north naples. through my binoculars i saw the objects close up. i saw a ring of spinning red dots forming each object. by he time my digital camera cued up the last object was going south rapidly alo

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were headed to the store it just got dark and as i was stopped at stop sign i noticed the light and pointed it out to my brother we then shut off the truck and got out to get a better look at it. it looked tuned shaped and had red lights spread out evenly which gave it the shape i believed it was. it looked to be about 2 telephone poles in length and maybe 10 to 20 ft in diameter and about 2 telephone poles above us with no sound what so ever.  we watched until it wasn't visible.
content.summary: Driving then saw lights i stopped got out and watched it till i couldn't see it. it rotated slowly counter clockwise

content.detailedDescription: Returning from a family vacation in the north carolina mountains in 2001, i suddenly sighted a group of five objects, flying in a v formation, over a marshy area off of interstate 95 south in south carolina.  it was on a late afternoon in july in full daylight.  the objects were parallel with our vehicle when i first became aware of them and were progressing south.  they appeared to be smooth oval shapes with a brushed chrome finish (metallic, but not shiny).  there were no markings or protuberances of any kind visible on any of them. they were completely silent and moving at a relatively low altitude.  they appeared to be in no hurry.  they were, however, moving faster than our 65 mph. i continued to watch the craft until they finally disappeared over the horizon.  i will never forget this encounter.  it took me totally by surprise, and i was immediately aware that these were not "normal" vehicles.  there was no evidence of any type of conventional propulsion.  there was no evidence of propulsion at all.  they were enormous, smooth, metallic eggs gliding through the sky.  i felt incredibly fortunate that i had the privilege to witness this evidence that we are not alone.
content.summary: Ufo flying in formation

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i were outside doing yard work when she noticed something in the sky, i look up and see what i would describe as a ufo. my mother is very skeptical but i  knew immediately exactly what i was looking at. i watched it for approximately 5 minutes, and it seemed to be stationary the entire time, i then ran to get my husband from the backyard. when we got back the object was nowhere in sight! we looked in every direction trying to find any kind of reflection or anything. there was nothing! it just vanished! the object was metallic, and disc shaped with the sun reflecting off of it. my mother thought it had headlights but i had to remind her it was daytime and a plane shouldn't have headlights. especially during the day! i was mesmerized by this thing. and very disappointed when it was gone to say the least. after the sighting i started questioning myself. just wondering if i really just saw a ufo.
content.summary: My mother saw something in the sky, so i run over there and see a disc floating in the air.

content.detailedDescription: At friends house walking home with 2other friends past open field at maiden place lower earley reading england berkshire,i turned to my friends and said don't you think the moon is very orange and very low, my friend replying to me said no look behind the moon is there,this is when the orange large object zipped into centre view then split into 3,then it came towards us at phenomenal speed making us duck down then it went away from us at ridiculous speeds joined back into one large object then shot away from us into a pinprick of light then ping it was gone in about 5 secs from large as moon to a pinprick???????.?? true as i am writing this and living and breathing one of my friends was a doctor who he see the same thing
content.summary: One orange ball size of moon then split into 3 orange balls

content.detailedDescription:
May 17th 2015

it was about 830-930pm.  some people were lighting fireworks, but these weren't fire works. 4 of us were on the front porch and i saw this orange orb coming over the tree tops and moving slowly in our direction.  then i saw another one behind it.  that one seemed to fade away.  the first one moved from the south and made a sharp turn towards the ne.  shortly thereafter (maybe 5min) another one came over the tree tops and moved in the same direction as the first one.  they were moving slowly. they also seemed to be on the same trajectory.

i went online to see if there was any info.  i saw one video from ny that showed 8-10 of the same objects.  our objects moved the same way.  they disappeared into the ne sky.

i pointed this out to the others on the porch and said look at that; i pointed.  one other woman on the porch was also looking at it and both of us thought it wasn't a plane, fireworks, helicopter; nothing.  it made no noise.  i thought it was a ufo.  i'm sorry, i don't have a cell phone to record stuff; believe it or not, there are still some of us out there.

the whole event took about 15 mins.
content.summary: 3 glowing orbs coming in a line out of the south.  one disappeared and two moved slowly towards the ne.  they moved slowly through the night sky.

content.detailedDescription: at the time, i was 8 yrs old and with my mother at kmart. we got out of the car and started walking through the full parking lot. while we was walking i looked up and there it was a black disc with red lights underneath it just hovering above the parking lot. i stopped and showed my mother and she saw it too. we hurriedly went into kmart. i felt like it was trying to tell me to not be afraid. but my mother was scared. we stayed in for a couple of hours and when we finally came out it was gone.
content.summary: I saw a ufo at kmart.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work after my shift ended at just after midnight.  where i live there are no street lights and it was a cloudy night, no stars or moon visible.  as i reached the top of the hill, less then a mile from home a light caught my eye and i looked out of my car window.  to my right there is a hill, with scots pine trees on it.  right above the trees, a good few feet above them an orb of fire suddenly appeared.  it did not move and just seemed to pulsate a few times before it vanished just as quickly as it had appeared.  if it had not been so cloudy i would have thought it was a meteor, but it also did not move across the sky as you would expect it to.  i was so surprised that i nearly drove off the road.  i stopped and waited to see if it would appear again but i saw nothing more.  it had just gone.
content.summary: Hovering fireball like orb

content.detailedDescription:
we were vacationing on little spider lake about 17 miles ne of hayward wi. every evening there were six of us who played pinochle in my cabin. about 9:30 pm the resort owner came to our window and said to come and see the northern lights. we all went down to the lake and stood on the dock. i immediately said "those are not the northern lights''.

    there appeared to be something very small about 500 to 1000 feet above the water across the bay. from this apex shown six or eight beams of pure white lights that were like lasers in that there was no deflextion in them.
the beams looked to be about six to eight inches in diameter. most of the beams were over the water but two or three looked like they may be on the opposite shore. we gazed at this for maybe five minutes when someone suggested we get back to the game and we did.

    i wish i had taken pictures of the sight but i didn't. for years i have wondered if anyone else has reported such an event. it was a very clear night. there was no movement while we observed. we all witnessed the same thing and agreed none of us experienced anything like it before. pease tell by email if this was a possible ufo.
.
content.summary: A spot in the sky with beams to the water and ground.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi, my name is fahad and i live in karachi,sindh,pakistan. on the night of feburary 6th i was with my friends late night. there was electricity loadshedding in our area and due to summer we went out to sit in a park due to heat in the houses.

it was 2.30am we walked out gather around and walked to the park. as we approched the park we sit inside and my friends start smoking right after half hour or 25 mints we noticed a star like light much brighter and bigger getting closer to us slowly. we thought its a plane or something and didnt paid attention to it. the light keep coming closer and it got that closed that we can see its shape. it was diamond like object and it was not a human made craft. we were shocked to see it. it was glowing white and arround it different light were blinking like red blue orange yellow. we were so excited as my friend said hey let me make a video of this and he took out his phone. as he took out his phone it went dead like battery was sucked dry. the light come closer and closer and right after few seconds it was only 20 to 30 feet above us. my friends were in panik and shacking due to fear i was also very shocked.As we are thinking how to get rid of this situation a very bright beem of light which was coloured off-white shine straight towards us from blow the diomond shaped ufo and suddenly me and my friends were parolized. we were unable to move not even a finger and unable to say anything.

there was no one in the park due to late night. this is the last thing i remember of being parolized. and after that when we woke up we were in the same park laying on the grass. we were 3 friends including me.My friends woke me up at that time we coudnt remember any thing that happend to us and after 3 days when i tried to remember what happened then this is the whole story i remember. i also ask my friends and they also remembered the same thing only till we got paralized. then i noticed that this indcident happend to us at 3.15 am or so and when we woke up in the park it was 4.30am when i got to the home it was 4.45am in the morning. i was suprised and at the time i thought we would have sleept in the park but now i think me and my friends were abduced by that ufo. iam sharing my story here cuz it is real. we were so scared that we didnt told our story to any one else that they would think that we are crazy. overall nothing happend after the ufo experience and we didnt felt any thing uncomfortable till now.
content.summary: A ufo abducted me and my friends

content.detailedDescription:
I've been contacted and talked to (telepathically), controlled and psychologically tortured by aliens beginning in 2011.  before they began talking to me they were banging on my closet door.  they've also given me brain damage (even though i've had two mri's and a cat scan that i've told were all normal).  they've also been controlling the people around me.  they showed me that they can also control the weather.  they change the shadows eerily and make me think i'm going to be eaten or murdered.  

on one incident there was something in my apartment either eating or just moving around my dog's food.  later that day the top of my garbage can was knocked over.

another incident that took place was when they made the elevator go down instead of up and then made a dog snorting/barking noise in my apartment.

there have also been knocking coming from the closet door and another door at 3 am and it looked like no one was there.

in october of 2014 a bright light flashed in my apartment and suddenly minutes later it looked like someone was wrapped up in one of my blankets on the floor.  i ran out of my apartment and saw strange lights in the apartment building so i ran outside across the street and could sense the aliens out there.  beams of light came down and hit the ground.
content.summary: Flashes of light, alien voices, beam of light

content.detailedDescription: There was lights everywhere nothing like you ever before.. no plane's was in the area no noise nothing but lights going everywhere plz contact me and let me know what you get out of these pictures i'm sending u
content.summary: Nothing i've ever seen before lights beaming down and lights circling one big bright light

content.detailedDescription:
[name removed/cms/rjl]									5/18/2015

my boyfriend and i had a strange sighting yesterday late afternoon while bank fishing along the monongahela river in charleroi, pa. it was sunny, with a few clouds. i had my line in the water and was looking in the sky, watching out for a possible pop up thunderstorm. i had my sunglasses on and spotted a dark sphere coasting along in the sky in front of us. it moved closer to our position and appeared to slow down. i got my boyfriend josh’s attention on it. at first he couldn’t see it because it was way up there and the bright sun made it hard to focus on it. he did see it and we watched it. i got a better look with my sunglasses on. it was an acorn shaped dark black object, however one area seemed to be flashing a red light on the left middle part of it. there was nothing reflective on this object. it definitely was not a mylar balloon. this object was much larger than a small balloon. if i had to guess, i’d say it was approx. half the size of a volkswagon bug car. this object did not move with the wind, it moved against it and hovered for 2-3 minutes. while watching this, i was stunned to see an identical object fly into sight right a few feet above the one we were already watching. it was the exact same dark black acorn shaped object that did not reflect the sun. this object had a blue flashing light in the same spot on it, as the other one. both objects hovered for 4-5 minutes, then slowly moved away from us. i kept questioning what it was that we saw. i was perplexed that these objects did not reflect the sunlight. 
	we went about our day and arrived home later that evening. that night, my boyfriend had a hard time sleeping. he had a stomach ache, probably from something he ate earlier. he did seem anxious last night. i remember he woke me up in the middle of the night asking me if i had heard “that knocking”. i did not hear the knocking he heard. after he woke me up, he went upstairs to check on it. he heard nothing while checking throughout the house. he came back and described the repetitious strange knocking sound he heard. i just chalked it up to maybe he was mistakenly hearing someone knocking on a neighbors door. we both went back to sleep. about an hour later he woke me up again to tell me our 11 year old daughter was at the top of the stairs calling me. i got up and walked to the bottom of the stairs and asked her what was wrong. she said she was scared, that she saw a face in her room. she wasn’t overly scared, so it didn’t alarm me. i assumed she just had a bad dream and i told her to go back to bed. she hesitated but did. she also slept with her light on in her room the rest of the night. then around sunrise i was awakened by a loud noise of dishes sliding around in the kitchen sink upstairs. i didn’t really feel alerted ,as that kind of thing has happened before.
during breakfast, my daughter told me what happened during the night that scared her. she said something woke her up and she opened her eyes to a startling sight of face right up in her face. maybe 1-2 inches away. she said it had white skin and was a slight human shape to it. she drew a picture of it and it to me, it looked like a hybrid. she made the eye pupils dark and bigger than the average humans. she said it was just staring at her. she said she couldn’t tell if it was male or female and didn’t see any hair. just the face. she said she closed her eyes and opened them up a few seconds later and it was still there. she said then the face slowly faded away.

it didn’t occur to me that this all could be connected until late this morning. i felt it was important to report this and document it. i plan on setting up my camcorder tonight to see if i can catch anything in the house. i have to try.
content.summary: Daytime sighting of 2 acorn shape large dull black ufo's followed by possible night abduction

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside on my front porch. my house faces south. it was approximately 9:45 pm, may 9, 2015. out of the corner of my eye i detected a flash of light and immediately a bright orb streaked across the sky not far from me and then disappeared from sight. initially i assumed somebody was setting off fireworks so i waited for the fizzle or pop that would surely follow, but it was completely silent, which immediately struck me as odd. the only thing i could compare what i saw was similar to a shooting star, but it did not just fizzle out the way meteorites and, and this was much too close to be a meteorite. if it was a shooting star, than it was huge, which is why i just assumed it was close....Like a firework. it came from the east and travelled west and it crossed the skyline in about five seconds. since it was gone, i didn't think anything else of it. approximately five minutes later, the street lights started going off one by one, sequentially, from east to west, following the same path of the orb that just wizzed by. the lights remained off for about thirty seconds and came back on, again, one by one, in sequence, from east to west.

i don't know if anyone else witnessed and/or reported the event, but i sure would like to know what i possible saw that night.
content.summary: Bright orb that streaked past the house

content.detailedDescription: I was outside by the pool at appx 3 am smoking a cigarette and watching the stars that were brightly shining in a very clear sky with no clouds at all. i have had dozens of ufo sightings in my life so i make it a habit to scan the sky whenever i am outside in the hope that i will add another sighting to my already miraculous mental library of technologically advanced craft, whether human in origin or other-worldly in nature. i was looking straight up and i noticed a 'flash' of light moving from the north to the south in the sky. the light appeared to be emanating from the top of the craft and did not flash in any sequence whatsoever, just a random flash every now and again. i did not observe any 'normal' green or red flashing lights or strobes as is required in normal aviation rules nor did i see any white strobe light(s) on this craft either, just the random flash of the dome light on top of the circular craft. there was an almost invisible violet haze surrounding the craft which solidified my suspicion that this was not any normal craft that i am aware of - but i also know that humans have reverse-engineered ufo's for decades now and i have no doubt that someone on this planet probably has a fleet of human-piloted anti-gravitic craft flying around that we are not privy to. as i stated earlier, the craft was heading south and flashing randomly when it stopped mid-flight and hovered for a brief moment and then reversed it's heading to a northern heading and traversed about a mile (estimated) and suddenly disappeared altogether in a flash of bright light ! i did not hear any sound coming from the craft either despite it being so quiet outside at 3 am. i continued scanning the sky for other craft that don't fit the normal mode of known aircraft but finally gave up after about 10 minutes and went back inside to bed. whenever i have a sighting of any kind, i always reach out to the craft with my mind and thank whoever is flying the craft for allowing me to see them so clearly and i always wish them well with the hope and promise that so many of us on this planet are ready for a face-to-face encounter with them, but that we are being held back in ignorance by our own lying government officials that refuse to enlighten us with their knowledge of ufo's and hidden meetings between humans and our space-faring brethren. perhaps one day soon *crossing fingers* our visiting space friends will just show themselves to the planet in a way that can no longer be denied and help us to regain control of this devastated living planet and reverse the horrible damage we have done by sharing openly with us the technology and spirituality needed to move forward as a whole species and start to learn about all of the other amazing life that is teeming all around us in this universe. i continue to look to the sky and perhaps one day i will be lucky enough to meet them, but until then i will keep studying the unknown and try my best to be a better steward to this planet and my fellow humans. thank you mufon for being available to us folks and allowing us to share our information with each other - this is such an important subject of investigation and adds to the proof that this is all very real !
content.summary: 3 a.M. sighting of a disc shaped craft with a bright pulsating dome/light that hovered then reversed direction and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: My mother was sitting on our balconies she started screaming for us to come out side with her to see the fire cigarette shapes that were coming from the ocean one after the other there was about 7 in a row when going very fast then just stopped abruptly an was hovering over the tree an building line for ten minutes when i started to take video an pictures an after i did that i decided to go investigate an headed out to the beach when i seen one more that looked like it was coming from the shoreline and it proceeded to the same area as the others and after that one got to them they were gone in the matter of seconds....And i proceeded to go home an everyone else said that when the last one got there they just disappeared..The objects in my pics look just like the ones in the star child episode...And i also have video of this sighting...
content.summary: There was 5-7 bright fire cigarette shape objects one after the other coming from the ocean then all stopped and hovered for 10-15 minuets

content.detailedDescription:
Didn't see on your website a clear address setup just for sightings...

last night between approx. 11pm est... in listowel on can i witness what i describe as a smoking gun event... i wish i had a camera ive been wanting to get one for years but never got around to it.

i'm an amateur astronomer... i own an 8" newtonian reflector as well as 15x70 cavalry binocs.

i have never had a ufo experience before in my life im 41 years old... but i am open to it and that was a big reason i bought my equipment...

what i saw resembled this...

[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]

as well as this...

[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]

three lights in triangle formation... locked in formation they did not waver one bit.  i could not see anything in between the lights however which is why i also believe it could have been three craft in formation.

unlike the two links i provided where they captured the triangle high above and looking like a triangle... my sighting the lights we more parallel to earth... it was more a fly by what i saw not a fly over.   if someone told me the object was 500 to 100 feet in the air i would have said at max it was that...

traveled from south east to north west.... traveling at a speed unknown to man... easily super sonic ... made no sound what so ever.

the lights did not look like regular lights in that regular lights are bright and refract off my glasses sort of like a oncoming car light will refract off your windshield... these lights looked sorta like glow in the dark silly putty or a glow in the dark skeleton on halloween.. that sort of glow you know?

i caught the talk end of it with binocs but they revealed no new information or clarity.

the whole event lasted about 4 seconds to go from one end of the sky to the other.

the weird thing was that i was looking in the exact direction i needed to to see the start of the event... this was not a saw it out of the corner of my eye event... but as i say funny it sorta appeared out of nowhere and also left and faded away.... i could see stars out much much dimmer so why can i see stars but this light faded out... its almost as if it phased in ... flew over... phased out... if i was to guess...

because again as an amateur astronomer i notice weather and sky viewing conditions and things the average person doesn't even think about. 

i know the object was low because of how the angle between the lights changed as it flew by... i played a lot of video games i grew up with them and the game elite or stellar 7 were space like games...  and back in the day graphics were poor so these games used what are called vector graphics... simply stated lines... so after playing many hours i understand how a triangle moves and how it looks from nearly every conceivable direction...

because of my time spent as a kid playing vector gfx games i am pretty much as much as an expert as a normal guy gets having experience looking at shapes and how they move and change when they pass by with regards also to elevation etc..

i wanted to report it to you incase other reports come in from last night as well...

when you see something this close up and moving that fast and no sound... your life or rather your perspective changes in an instant.

something is going on for sure... either advanced military antigrav silent tech or alien or both...  all i know is that what i saw is impossible.... but it happened...
content.summary: Three lights in locked triangle formation super speed no sound

content.detailedDescription: Traveling in my vehicle on a back road when i observed a light... pale orange.. traveling rapidly... from my right to my left... directly in front of me... steady illumination... no sound all of a sudden it stopped... dead still... and hovered for 5-10 seconds... then started descending... picking up speed... seemed to be in a free fall... i became very excited as i thought i was about to witness it crash into the ground... then it suddenly stopped... hovered again for several seconds, then continued again in the same direction... the instant stop, hover, free fall, then instant stop again blew my mind.
content.summary: Fuzzy pale orange sphere flying fast...

content.detailedDescription: This was 31 to 32 yrs ago in ohio ona state route cant remember now i think it was state route 39 coming home from work i saw a object  coming out of sky with a fire coming out of tail it made a loud high pitch sound it scared me but i watched it land in firld to my left a semi truck was headed in other direction for some reason we both stopped and saw this object land in a field about 100 yards away it was pulsating a light and this bothers me more then anything but to tell you the color i cant it was a color i never saw before i asked driver of truck what the hell that was he didnt know either and to this day over 30 yrs later the color thing bothers me most. i told driver of truck im getting out of here he said same i drove about 30 seconds up road and a loud noise came from where it was and it soared in front of my car about 20 yards in front and was gone no where in sky was there any inclination it was ever there the whole thing lasted less then 3 min
content.summary: Color was one i never saw before

content.detailedDescription: Our riding group had just pulled off onto brushy ridge overlook which is at an elevation of 3750 feet above sea level. no object was seen by any of the people present, including myself. no planes were heard during the incident, no birds were seen as i was taking the photographs. it wasnt until later when i was looking at the photographs that i observed the object in the sky, the object was not visible in any of the other photographs that i had taken while at that location. i took probably 50 shots during the time of the incident. there is one other photograph which was taken in a southerly direction in which a black object is seen in the distance, but i was not able to enlarge the photograph without distortion to tell if it is the same object. that photograph would have been taken before the photograph with the clearly defined object and would have been in the proper time sequence if the object were moving in an easterly direction. i have spoken with others who were present at the time of the incident and no one else reported seeing anything unusual, however, all of them would have been facing the opposite direction during the time of the incident to have seen it, except for one other person who would have been facing the southerly direction as the object was to his southeast direction.
content.summary: Object noticed in photograph after time of occurrence.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girl friend, was visiting her sister in rødovre copenhagen. i was talking to my friend on the phone. when suddenly i see 2 completely soundless but relatively large aircrafts right above our head. my girlfriend freaked out and i tell it to my friend on the phone. it was dark outside but i still see it so clear to me it look like a space ship from star wars. with red/orange lights. the very weird thing is that i talk to the girl yesterday she is my ex girlfriend now. and she say she is 100% sure she saw it clearly llike i did. but she remember it like white light flashing orbs. and thats really really weird cause what i saw was a huge space ship.. this is freaking me out i cant forget abaut that day. and i have night terrors abaut it.. when i try to remember what happened i cant seem to put the pieces together right.. like for example i cant remember if the object slowly disappeared or instantly.. after i saw it its all blank i only remember how it look from my eyes and me and my girlfriends and my friend on the phones reaction. what should i do?? this was not a plane or anything else this was out of our world i've never seen anything like it and i dont know what to believe anymore.
content.summary: I saw these 2 huge ships with red/orange lights

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was in my bedroom, i was getting dressed and opened my curtains and saw it
2. because when i opened my curtains, i saw the light
3. i didn't know, i was scared. i thought it was a laser pointing at me
4. it was a metallic object with a big, glowing red light. it was floating in the same place for approximately 5 minutes before it flew off very quickly to the north west and disappeared before reaching the clouds. 
5. i was scared to begin with, but i felt more relaxed the longer i was there. i heard a police car and felt more safe despite not knowing why it was around. i quickly started trying to take a picture with my phone, but my phone kept falling out of my hand.
6. when it flew off
content.summary: Small light with obvious metal structure. was red and was hovering before indredibly quickly whizzing off

content.detailedDescription: My dogs were going crazy barking at back door so i went outside and thats when i noticed what i thought a very bright star.  it started to move closer and then away and then turned red and then back to bright.  i was also hearing a very strange sound, between a hum and maybe wind.  (i have never heard this sound before)  i first grabbed my ipad to start recording;  it was not even close to what i was witnessing so i ran inside and got my digital camera and started recording so i could the best view of this very odd object.  after 2 min of recording; i stopped; to be honest because it scared me.  about 10 min later it went slowly north from its location.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Unbelievable and an unforgettable experience to witness

content.detailedDescription:
I walked out onto back porch at 105am about 25 minutes ago .I observed two white lights that looked like two stars following each other in a straight line up and out of earth atmosphere from the north. i noticed these two lights passing bye this stars light that was stationary in the background this is what caught my attention they were not going fast from my perspective just going up into space.They left going up.I wonder what the military thinks when they see these things leaving our planet on radar because they have to see these things coming and going all the time.These were not planes unless they have planes that can fly into space.   
    thank you
content.summary: Saw 2 white lights appearing to leave earth going up from n.To ne .

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking through the kitchen as i checked the doors and windows before bed. as i checking the patio door, i looked up and saw a bright orange glow. it was 11:55pm, on sunday may the 17th, 2015. i yelled to the wife to come and take a look, and went back to the kitchen to look from a different window. it was too big to be a plane, and too slow. it reminded me of an orange led christmas bulb glowing at night. i watched as the orange glow slowly, very slowly, moved from my left side slowly across the sky. i didnt want to take my eyes off it but i needed to get it on video so i ran at got my cell phone. i ran outside into the backyard, the wife joined me, and we watched as it continued across the sky in an arc, it reminded me of a time lapsed moom setting. as it started to slip from view, it dimmed and the orange colour disappeared. the entire thing lasted 5 minutes tops. it disappeared from view behind my neighbours trees.

so here i am, 30 mins later in bed, unable to stop thinking about it. i wanted to writw it down while its all fresh so here i am reporting it. ill include the video but im not sure of the quality. i was pretty excited
content.summary: I observed a glowing object travel across the sky in an arc shaped pattern, ending with it appearing to descend as i lost sight

content.detailedDescription: I went out to walk my dog and noticed a light too big to be star. i got back to my street and the light was still there. my uncle pulled up in his truck and i told showed him the light and he said he thought it looked to close to be a star.  i ran and got my camera and took still pics and video to see what would turn up. during my last video the light completely vanished into thin air it seemed like. i took the camera away and it was gone. i was completely baffled. i didn't hear any noises and didn't see it hovering like a helicopter. i live near an aircraft light tower.
content.summary: Out walking dog and saw a light i thought was too big to be a star.

content.detailedDescription:
Saw 5 objects glowing different colors but not red or green like normal aircraft.The shocking thing about this sighting was there we're 5 objects moving at strange angles for aircraft. instantly changing direction at 45 degrees. objects departed i 5 different directipns came back together very fast 4 times normal jet aircraft speed then slowly coming together not in formation alone but connecting as one then finally leaving as one.Changing colors in each were yellow orange 
violet an white. i was in pool at night looking at stars when this happened a proxy 5 min. i am learning to fly an these had no red or green lights even when moving in opposite direction view satilights  planes helicopters nightly never saw anything like this.100 percent positive this was very different aircraft with strange flight abilities
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Saw 5 lights separate go in 5 different directions then come back together

content.detailedDescription:
I stepped outside and noticed a very bright light that was traveling very slowly southwest to northeast. i could clearly see venus, this was not that. the light brightened for a moment, continued moving north then quickly faded away to nothing. had it been a satellite it could easily have been crossing the terminator however, it brightened as i watched then faded away. 

i watch commercial aircraft often. this was too high in the sky for a commercial aircraft and it's apparent motion was way too slow. if it was a heavy jet with it's landing lights on the navigation lights would have remained visible after the bright light switched off. object had no navigation lights. 

not much, i know. but it was very odd and i felt worth reporting.
content.summary: Too slow to be a satellite - bright light

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting outside talking about the night sky and me an my friend happened to look up at what seemed it was a star or shooting start it was about the size of the north star then it got very bright like an explosion but it wasn't and then zipped away and disappeared  instantly it was crazy i was sketched out afterwards
content.summary: Went across the sky slowly got very bright then faded instantly as it zoomed away
